md:
giải nghĩa từ "engrossed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Engrossed (verb) /ɪnˈɡroʊst/:
	+ Meaning: to absorb someone's attention completely, so that they are not aware of anything else.
	+ Vietnamese: hấp dẫn, cuốn hút, mê hoặc.
	+ Example: "She was engrossed in the novel and didn't notice the time."
	+ Related words: absorbed, fascinated, captivated, enthralled.
	+ Antonyms: distracted, bored, uninterested.

* Engrossed (adjective) /ɪnˈɡroʊst/:
	+ Meaning: completely absorbed or interested in something.
	+ Vietnamese: mê hoặc, hấp dẫn, cuốn hút.
	+ Example: "He was engrossed in his work and didn't take a break all day."
	+ Related words: absorbed, fascinated, captivated, enthralled.
	+ Antonyms: distracted, bored, uninterested.

Note: The verb and adjective forms of "engrossed" have similar meanings, but the verb form implies a more active process of becoming absorbed, while the adjective form describes a state of being absorbed.

  • Engrossed (adjective) /ɪnˈɡroʊst/:

    • Example: "He was engrossed in his work and didn't take a break all day."

Note: The verb and adjective forms of "engrossed" have similar meanings, but the verb form implies a more active process of becoming absorbed, while the adjective form describes a state of being absorbed.
